summary: DT*:  THE CONTACT STATED A FIRE ERUPTED FROM THE VEHICLE.  IT WAS PARKED FOR OVER THIRTY MINUTES.  NO PREVIOUS PROBLEMS WERE REPORTED WITH THE VEHICLE.  THE FIRE DEPARTMENT WAS CALLED TO THE SCENE TO EXTINGUISH THE FIRE.  THE FIRE INVESTIGATOR'S WRITTEN REPORT STATED THE FIRE STARTED IN THE ENGINE COMPARTMENT.  THERE WAS ADDITIONAL PROPERTY DAMAGE TO SURROUNDING VEHICLES.  THE INSURANCE COMPANY INSPECTED THE VEHICLE AND DEEMED IT TOTALED.
